item.title: AI Video Generator - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled individual who can develop an AI-powered video generator that focuses on creating 1-minute explainer videos.

Key Requirements:
- AI Video Generator: The tool must be able to autonomously create explainer videos.
- Video Duration: The explainer videos should be limited to 1 minute in length.

Ideal Skills:
- Proficiency in AI: A solid understanding of artificial intelligence is necessary for the development of this video generator.
- Video Production: Experience in video production is a plus as it will help in understanding the requirements for creating appealing explainer videos.
- Graphic Design: Expertise in graphic design is a must to ensure the tool can deliver high-quality graphics.
- Understanding of Storytelling: While not a primary focus, a grasp of storytelling techniques could be beneficial in creating engaging videos.

If you have the skills and experience to create a high-quality, effective AI explainer video generator, I'd love to hear from you.

- We offer fixed weekly payments

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 27, 2024 15:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Artificial Intelligence
Skills: Artificial Intelligence
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video editor needed - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor needed to take livestream videos in m3u8, webm and ts formats and convert to mp4.  The Editor should have experience in taking individual stream video and audio outputs and construct merged videos in dynamic grid formats with text overlays, graphics and have experience working with professional media software such as Adome Premier Pro or Capcut.  

This will be an ongoing job, frequency depending on how often we conduct our livestreams (typically at least 2 per month at the moment).

We are looking for someone with not just the skills but the tools to do this very efficiently with high-quality results as we scale up and roll this out to the public to use.   The goal is to take streams of all aspect ratios, and provide a final video that is of high quality video and audio.

Please let us know your rates, specific experience, portfolio with examples, and when you can begin. We may have an immediate video you can edit as a trial. Thanks!




Posted On: June 27, 2024 14:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Enhancement, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Transcription Timestamping, Audio Transcription
Skills: Video Enhancement, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Transcription Timestamping, Audio Transcription
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking video editors for creating 1 to 3 minutes long YouTube videos - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for experienced video editors to create digital tutorial videos.

What you have to do?

- Recording, narration and editing of videos. (videos are screen-recorded)
- Video length from 1 to 3 minutes
- Payment: $2 per video topic
- 20 topics per week
Example video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nQKwELwSbfk

I'm looking for someone who's good at following instructions and likes to deliver a well-done job, eager to learn, doesn't like to cut corners, and DOESN'T HAVE A STRONG ACCENT.

There is the possibility of making videos longer than 3 minutes for which we would review the cost.

I would like to know if you have had previous experiences in similar jobs.

Do you agree with the proposed price? (if not, do not apply)
Do you have demonstrable previous experience? (if not, do not apply)


Budget: $200
Posted On: June 27, 2024 14:42 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Screencasting Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Narration, English, Explainer Video, Screen Recording
Skills: Screencasting Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Narration, English, Explainer Video, Screen Recording
Country: Venezuela
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
``Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency ```Requirements:```
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Familiarity with other editing software like Adobe Bridge, Capture One, and Maya is a plus
- Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 14:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Video editor for Space and Cosmos Realted YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor who can do the following:
- Find relevant footage or pictures for the video
- Add effects such as transitions, lower thirds and overlays at the start of videos
- Make an engaging video

To provide a clear idea of the type of content we aim to produce, please take a moment to view the following examples:

https://www.youtube.com/@SpacedustDOC/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@KosmoDOC/videos
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=13expQNZN7E
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2-Gdv0BO-oI

We kindly request that you watch a few videos on the sample channels to grasp the specific style of video editing we're seeking.

The videos will be around 1.5 hours (90 minutes) long.

Payment: $90 per video
We are looking for someone who is communicative, responsive, and understands what makes a video enjoyable to watch.

In your proposal include:
- your portfolio/previous work
- how many videos you think you'd be able to make
- any other relevant previous work

Budget: $90
Posted On: June 27, 2024 14:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Cutting-edge video creator - Upwork
item.description:
Expanding marketing agency looking to recruit a rockstar video editor to create awesome videos for reels, shorts, and a YT channel. Plenty of room for advancement and long-term employment if you show unique flair and artistry combined with competent, hard-working, and efficient.

Skills required:

- Excellent English is a MUST (both written and spoken)
- knowledge of clickbaity strategies and creation of intrigue

Note - write ‘Atlas is the best’ in your application so we know you’ve taken the time to read this
description!!

Required personal attributes:

- Strong work ethic
- Focus and efficiency
- Great English skills

Expect a long-term role with plenty of room for growth. We’ll start small but this can grow if you can create what I want 🙌!


Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 14:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Monetization
